# showsPaperSize

**Type Property**

The PDF panel shows a menu of paper sizes.

## Declaration

```swift
static var showsPaperSize: NSPDFPanel.Options { get }
```

## Constants

- **showsOrientation**: The PDF panel shows the current orientation of the PDF contents, such as landscape or portrait.
- **requestsParentDirectory**: The PDF panel doesn’t show a name field; instead, it allows the user to identify a directory in which to save multiple PDF files. If you set this flag, you’re responsible for appending a filename and the “pdf” extension to the resulting  URL value in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPDFInfo] object before proceeding with the creation of the PDF file (or calling the `takeSettingsFromPDFInfo` method of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPrintInfo]).
